product_name: Pacific Play Tents Mesh Tunnel - 4 ft.
long_description: Perfect for kid-sized fun, the 4 ft. Pacific Play Tents Mesh Tunnel features solid fabric on the bottom and mesh on top. Sturdy steel-spring construction; tunnel springs open once you undo the attached rip-and-stick straps. Made of water-repellent polyester; interior padding provides comfort. Set up on soft or smooth surface only; avoid using near a fireplace or open flame. To store, compress tunnel down until it's completely flat; keep pressing while you secure the rip-and-stick straps. Clean with a soft cloth or sponge, cool water and liquid soap. Air dry only.
short_description: Perfect for kid-sized fun, the 4 ft. Pacific Play Tents Mesh Tunnel features solid fabric on the bottom and mesh on top.
